评论详情: I ordered this with a gift card. I got for Christmas and it looked nothing like the photo so incredibly small around the arms very very thin not good quality. Absolutely awful would never recommend this
It works for going over another top. Nice with jeans
Button fell of while trying on. Two stars because it looked cute.
I love the shirt. I love the color. The softness the way it washes no shrinkage fit exactly the way I imagined it. It is great for the winter. It is nice and warm
In really like this sweater I keep it at my desk if I get cold It’s soft and the color is great I am just happy with this purchase

So soft and loose and comfortable!! I wash it in the washer and let it hang up dry and it looks great... No wrinkles Such a good price that I bought it in a different color. Great for layering in could weather!!
So soft, perfect fit.

评论概述: Super cute, but not shacket material
评论详情: Very cute and comfy, but the title is misleading, it's not shacket material. It's thin and a bit oversized, so looks good over various tops, but I have a couple of other shackets and the material of this one is nowhere near similar. I do love it and wear it often, but want to make it clear for others that may be looking for something on the thicker side.

It’s soft and comfortable but bought to wear as a shacket style top over other shirts and it’s thinner than expected. Still stylish and a good shirt, just not what I thought I was getting. Great price!
I would probably size up if you want the oversized baggy look! Otherwise it’s cute for a casual outfit! But the oversized look would have been nice to dress up
Like the style and fit, thinner than I expected, able to see thru material between vertical line design of fabric.

评论概述: Casual, relaxed fit. Fits way too big.
评论详情: This button down shirt has a lovely chill, relaxed fit. Color is same as shown in the picture, same design. But it is way too big. I understand it has a loose fitting, but loose doesn't mean BIG. I had to give it to my aunt and she uses M/L, and even to her it had a loose fit. But fabric is soft, feels good to the skin. Style is chic and casual. Good for fall... Washed it in cold water and delicate and came out alright. No loose strings, or anything similar. My aunt likes it, and don't get me wrong, i do too, but i just think this is not the right sizing.
So soft fabric.  Pretty silver gray color. Fits to size. Lightweight
It’s light weight but still warm. I got a size small. I’m 113 ibs and 5’3. If you like to have longer sleeves I recommend sizing up!
Love it.

Rayon blend shacket is warm and cozy. It washes well in cold water and a low tumble dryer and will not pill or shrink. The buttons have stayed on, and the batwing sleeves are big and roomy. The well made shacket comes to about midthigh. Normally, I would wear a Medium, but I ordered a Small, and it is plenty roomy. Nice for casual wear.
Odd fit Not fitted but odd cut under arms Color not a true blue
Cheap . Not worth the money . Good enough to wear around the house , Won’t keep you warm .. You wouldn’t want to wear it with something long sleeve  underneath .

Fall is for shackets - I probably have gotten about 5-8 of them for this season. Before we get the snow and have to start wearing thicker coats, this is a great option for the cooler mornings and evenings and then more even tempered daytime temperatures.

This runs large but that is the look of the sweater. Very soft fabric but easy to snag. I wouldn't say this sweater is the most flattering but it is so comfortable that I still find myself reaching for it. The only thing that drives me nuts is that the collar keeps flopping inward and I constantly need to fix it. Other than the collar this is a nice lightweight, casual, and very soft sweater. I love the soft color and texture. Nice item but know it is supposed to be oversized.

This shirt is so cute and comfy! The material is crazy soft and just lightweight enough for fall weather. You would probably need an extra layer for anything below 50 degrees, but it's perfect for a cooler fall day. The color is nice and flattering on my pale skin, and the fit is perfect. 10/10 recommend.

I got this to wear for the cooler temperatures and am extremely pleased with it. I wanted something loose fitting that was soft and lightweight.  This fit my needs perfectly.  The material is good and the stitching and assembly is clean and straight.  I can't wait to start wearing this when the temp drops.
Super pretty color and the quality’s nice.. it’s really soft and comfortable on the skin, thin and breathable so it’ll be good for warmer and breezier days..

评论概述: This is going to be worn a-LOT!!
评论详情: The ribbed knit button-down shacket is a versatile addition to any wardrobe. Made of lightweight, stretchy fabric, it offers both comfort and style for cooler days. The oversized fit and dropped sleeves create a flattering silhouette, while the full button-down closure and collared neckline add a classic touch.  This shacket's versatility shines through its ability to be worn as either a shirt or a jacket. It pairs well with tank tops for a layered look or stands alone as a stylish top. The solid color and distressed boyfriend style make it a fashionable choice for various occasions, from casual outings to office wear.  Suitable for spring, fall, and winter, this garment keeps you warm without sacrificing breathability. Its longer back and single chest pocket contribute to its unique design. The shacket flatters different body shapes and can elevate your look whether you're heading to college, work, or a casual date.  To maintain its quality, it's recommended to machine wash gently in a laundry bag or hand-wash with cold water. Avoid bleaching and opt for hanging or line drying to increase durability. With proper care, this shacket will remain a staple in your wardrobe, offering both style and functionality throughout the seasons.
